Package com.aestasit.markdown.slidery

Class Summary
Slidery Slidery conversion methods from Markdown to HTML to DOM.
ToHtmlSlides Visitor pattern implementation that walks through AST created by Pegdown parsing library and produces structured output with the help of HTML5 tags:
